projects.name: Artifact
projects.description: A modern Electron desktop application designed for product managers to create, share, and collaborate on artifacts. Build visual canvases with specs, screenshots, Figma links, prototypes, and ideas. Features a social feed for team collaboration and a carousel mode for presentations.
features: Canvas workspace with drag & drop functionality
Carousel presentation view for stakeholder reviews
Social feed with search, reactions, and bookmarks

projects.name: PM Spec Analyzer
projects.description: A Streamlit-based Socratic review tool that helps product managers write better specifications. Uses Claude Code CLI to analyze specs across 8 dimensions, asking targeted clarifying questions to improve thinking and decision-making.
features: 8-dimensional analysis (Problem Definition, User Understanding, Success Metrics, etc.)
Stage-aware questioning (Early Draft, Developing, Final Review)
Session auto-save with full Q&A transcript
No API keys required - runs entirely locally

projects.name: PM Spec Analyzer Mac App
projects.description: Native macOS application version of the PM Spec Analyzer. Built with tkinter for a native Mac experience, featuring the same comprehensive spec evaluation and Socratic coaching methodology, with exportable results and no external API dependencies.
features: Text paste or file upload support
Export results to text or PDF

projects.name: ServiceNow MCP Server
projects.description: Production-ready Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables Claude to interact with ServiceNow instances. Supports incident management, service catalog operations, change requests, knowledge base management, and workflow automation with multiple authentication methods.
features: Multiple authentication methods (Basic, OAuth, API Key)
Incident Management tools with full CRUD operations
Change Request management and approval workflows

projects.name: Claude MCP Tools
projects.description: A collection of reusable Model Context Protocol tools including Memory Vault for semantic conversation storage and Smart Rate Limiter for token-aware request throttling. Features both simple and production-ready implementations with FAISS vector search and SQLite persistence.
features: Memory Vault: Store conversations with semantic embeddings
Smart Rate Limiter with token-aware throttling
Both simple and full-featured server implementations

projects.name: Task Master Proxy
projects.description: Express-based MCP proxy server that bridges Claude Desktop with a Replit-deployed task manager API. Implements bidirectional WebSocket communication for real-time task management through Claude's conversational interface.
features: Request forwarding to external task manager API
Support for both stdio and WebSocket protocols

projects.name: Momentum
projects.description: A minimalist Chrome new tab extension that replaces the default new tab page with a distraction-free experience featuring a real-time clock, curated Naval Ravikant quotes for daily inspiration, and beautiful background images from Bing's collection.
features: Curated Naval Ravikant quote rotation for daily inspiration
Beautiful background images from Bing's daily collection
Zero permissions required for maximum privacy

projects.name: Journal Bot
projects.description: A personal journaling bot for Telegram that enables users to capture and review journal entries directly from their chat interface. Features persistent JSON storage and simple command-based interaction for quick daily journaling.
features: Persistent JSON storage for all entries

projects.name: OpenWebUI
projects.description: Foundational Python 3.11+ project structure for building modern web-based user interfaces. Includes basic project setup with modern Python tooling and configuration.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Elegant portfolio website showcasing side projects and hustles built with Claude Code. Features a Stripe Press-inspired minimalist design with beautiful typography, clean layouts, and dynamic project loading from JSON.
features: Dynamic project loading from JSON data
Filterable project categories (Desktop, Web, MCP, Extensions, Bots)
